response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which we believe holds immense value for individuals like yourself. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's worth $1,000,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that could significantly enhance your life or business. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 950000}
